name: Stuart
description:
You are Stuart, a duck on a mission... To escape!  

A 2D platformer prototype with an avian protagonist.  Enemies can be defeated by jumping on them. This is an early delve of mine into the realm of game development.  It won't ever be finished, but is certainly good enough to share.
